Passaic.Carlstadt Public Schools:
The Carlstadt Public Schools is a community public school district that serves students in pre-kindergarten through eighth grade from the Borough of Carlstadt in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its one school had an enrollment of 835 students and 43.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 19.4:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "DE", the fifth-highest of eight groupings.
